doc:
Chad Allen (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chad_Allen_(actor) 0 Chad Allen (born June 5, 1974) is a retired American actor. Beginning his career at the age of seven, Allen is a three-time Young Artist Award winner and GLAAD Media Award honoree. He was a teen idol during the late 1980s as David Witherspoon on the NBC family drama Our House and as Zach Nichols on the NBC sitcom My Two Dads before transitioning to an adult career as Matthew Cooper on the CBS western drama Dr. Quinn: Medicine Woman. He announced his retirement from acting in April 2015. Chad_Allen ( born June_5_,_1974 ) is a_retired_American_actor . Beginning his_career at the_age of seven , Allen is a_three-time_Young_Artist_Award_winner and GLAAD_Media_Award_honoree . He was a_teen_idol during the_late_1980s as David_Witherspoon on the_NBC_family_drama_Our_House and as Zach_Nichols on the_NBC_sitcom My_Two_Dads before transitioning to an_adult_career as Matthew_Cooper on the_CBS_western_drama_Dr._Quinn : Medicine_Woman . He announced his_retirement from acting in April_2015 .
